entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
